meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or alarm.
meanings.sent1: Aiyee! I didn't expect to see you here!
meanings.sent2: Aiyee! Look at that beautiful rainbow!
meanings.sent3: Aiyee! You scared me by jumping out like that!
meanings.sent4: Aiyee! The sudden thunder was like a surprise attack!
meanings.sent5: Aiyee! The magician's trick left the audience in awe!

meanings.definition: A cry of distress or pain.
meanings.sent1: The aiyee of the injured cat echoed through the alley.
meanings.sent2: I heard an aiyee coming from the forest, signaling danger.
meanings.sent3: The aiyee of the lost child brought the search party running.
meanings.sent4: Her aiyee was a piercing sound in the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The aiyee of the wounded soldier filled the battlefield with sorrow.
